issue.title: [Java][Docs] Add developer docs for Java
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15178](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15178). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Inspired by <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/developers/python.html> and <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/developers/cpp/index.html> we should have a similar doc for Java
